class_notes:
399R is intended for students newly beginning their independent research experiences. 
After lining up a faculty research advisor, students should submit a permission number request form. The link to the form and helpful information are available on the department's "Get Involved in Research" website (http://chemistry.emory.edu/home/undergraduate/research.html).
course_description: Introduces students to instrumental procedures and empirical techniques used in chemical research. Total credit not to exceed four hours. Cannot be used to meet course requirements for a chemistry major.
sections: Class Nbr: 3308, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Brathwaite, Status: Open
